statements: SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_incidents;
SELECT victim_name, report_status FROM cyberbullying_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, bully_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, victim_name, incident_date, report_status FROM cyberbullying_incidents;
SELECT bully_name, evidence FROM cyberbullying_incidents;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT incident_id, victim_name, bully_name FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE report_status = 'pending' ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT AVG(incident_id) AS avg_incident_id FROM cyberbullying_incidents GROUP BY report_status
SELECT DISTINCT victim_name, bully_name FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT incident_id, victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE report_status = 'resolved' ORDER BY incident_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT victim_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE victim_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT bully_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(evidence_id) AS num_evidence FROM evidence_storage GROUP BY incident_id HAVING COUNT(evidence_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_incidents;
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE incident_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM evidence_storage WHERE storage_location = 'Secure Storage';
SELECT incident_id, evidence_link FROM evidence_storage WHERE evidence_id > 100 AND retention_policy = '30 days';
SELECT victim_name AS Victim, bully_name AS Bully, incident_date AS Date FROM cyberbullying_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, reported_user FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE reported_by = 'Alice';
SELECT report_id, incident_description FROM cyberbullying_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT r.report_id, ra.attachment_url, ra.attachment_type FROM cyberbullying_reports r JOIN evidence_attachments ra ON r.report_id = ra.report_id;
SELECT rs.report_id, rs.status, rs.updated_at, cr.report_date FROM report_status rs JOIN cyberbullying_reports cr ON rs.report_id = cr.report_id;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports
SELECT report_id, reported_by, incident_description FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' AND reported_user = 'Alice'
SELECT r.*, a.attachment_url FROM cyberbullying_reports r INNER JOIN evidence_attachments a ON r.report_id = a.report_id
SELECT r.*, s.status FROM cyberbullying_reports r INNER JOIN report_status s ON r.report_id = s.report_id WHERE s.status = 'Pending' ORDER BY r.report_date DESC

SELECT r.report_id, r.report_date, COUNT(a.attachment_id) AS num_attachments FROM cyberbullying_reports r LEFT JOIN evidence_attachments a ON r.report_id = a.report_id GROUP BY r.report_id HAVING num_attachments > 0
SELECT * FROM evidence_of_incidents;
SELECT reporter_name, reporter_email FROM reporter_details WHERE reporter_id = 1;
SELECT person_name, person_age, person_gender FROM reported_person WHERE person_age > 20;
SELECT category_name FROM cyberbullying_categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM evidence_of_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM evidence_of_incidents
SELECT evidence_details, incident_date FROM evidence_of_incidents
SELECT person_name, person_age, person_gender FROM reported_person WHERE person_age > 18
SELECT reporter_name, reporter_email FROM reporter_details
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM cyberbullying_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM evidence_of_incidents WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT description FROM evidence_of_incidents WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM evidence_of_incidents ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM evidence_of_incidents WHERE incident_id = 2 AND description LIKE '%crime%';
SELECT * FROM evidence_of_incidents WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM evidence_of_incidents WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT description FROM evidence_of_incidents WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, description, date FROM evidence_of_incidents WHERE incident_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM evidence_of_incidents ORDER BY date ASC, incident_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(incident_id) AS total_incidents FROM evidence_of_incidents;
